name: Walk Virtual Reality 3D Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Virtual Reality.
Walk Virtual Reality 3D Joke - a game simulator joke virtual reality!
Try to take a walk in our city with the help of virtual reality! Walk along the streets and on the roads, just be careful with the car!
For a more realistic effect using the gyro! To use the phone you need to rotate around themselves at the same time you'll see, it's like your eyes.
Like it is all very exciting and interesting!
ATTENTION! The game was created for fun and jokes and does not bear any harm!
You can download the game now is completely free to use and without an internet connection! Leave us your feedback and evaluation, we really appreciate your
